item.title: Model - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: Chapter 5. Model Domain Model Data model of the application consists of following classes Symbol – holds details about a symbol DataGroup – holds various categories of data like BS (Balance Sheet), PL (Profit and Loss), CF (Cash Flow) etc Data - segregates the data into different time periods. Fact - holds key and value for each item of financial indicator UML diagram of the model is as shown in figure
